oai_dc:dc.dc:title: T. J. Searcy
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: portraits; religion; Searcy, T. J.;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Notes from back: Rev. T.J. Searcy -- Doctor of Divinity from Roger Williams College in Nashville -- elected chairman of Educational Board of Natl. Baptist Convention in early 1900's.
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: black & white photo, oval, 3 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Memphis & Shelby County Room Photograph Collection
